title: ng-packagr Target
description:
Builds an Angular library with support for incremental builds.

This executor is meant to be used with buildable libraries in an incremental build scenario. It is similar to the `@nx/angular:package` executor but it only produces ESM2022 bundles.

presets.name: Updating Project Dependencies for Buildable Library

project.description: The file path for the ng-packagr configuration file, relative to the workspace root.

tsConfig.description: The full path for the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the workspace root.

watch.description: Whether to run a build when any file changes.

poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds. _Note: this is only supported in Angular versions >= 18.0.0_.
